item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 19, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. When imperfect systems are good: Bluesky's lossy timelines (314 points | 135 comments)
2. Show HN: Mastra – Open-source JS agent framework, by the developers of Gatsby (247 points | 83 comments)
3. 1972 Unix V2 "Beta" Resurrected (10 points | discuss)
4. Show HN: Subtrace – Wireshark for Docker Containers (142 points | 32 comments)
5. Accelerating scientific breakthroughs with an AI co-scientist (216 points | 105 comments)
6. Relaxed Radix Balanced Trees (2024) (114 points | 9 comments)
7. Debugging Hetzner: Uncovering failures with powerstat, sensors, and dmidecode (259 points | 68 comments)
8. Broken legs and ankles heal better if you walk on them within weeks (229 points | 173 comments)
9. Malaysia is betting on data centers to boost its economy (8 points | discuss)
10. I ditched my Pi-hole but still block ads with NextDNS (48 points | 39 comments)
11. Apple’s closed-source approach is losing out to AI app builders (32 points | 19 comments)
12. A secret poker game you can play on the subway (148 points | 59 comments)
13. Apple Debuts iPhone 16e (286 points | 440 comments)
14. Microsoft unveils Majorana 1 quantum processor (281 points | 118 comments)
15. Multiple Russia-aligned threat actors actively targeting Signal Messenger (510 points | 196 comments)

19. I built a large language model "from scratch" (17 points | discuss)
20. Beautiful, boring, and without soul (33 points | 8 comments)
21. An inside look at NSA tactics, techniques and procedures from China's lens (133 points | 32 comments)
22. Show HN: MOS6502 in pure Lua running in WebAssembly (5 points | discuss)
23. Minuteman III test showcases readiness of U.S. nuclear force's deterrent (22 points | 51 comments)
24. One Head, Two Brains (2015) (13 points | 6 comments)
25. Alice Hamilton waged a one-woman campaign to get the lead out of everything (378 points | 161 comments)
26. Thoughts on Daylight Computer (259 points | 124 comments)
27. Typst 0.13 is out now (189 points | 35 comments)
28. A Language Server for Postgres (63 points | 12 comments)
29. 1977 Jazz-Funk Musical Adaptation of Dune (72 points | 24 comments)
